titleStmt.title: The first sermon of R. Sheldon priest, after his conuersion from the Romish Church preached before an honourable assembly at S. Martins in the Field, vpon Passion Sunday, &c. Published by authoritie.
titleStmt.author: Sheldon, Richard, d. 1642?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] B[eale] for Nathanael Butter,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached at S. Martins in the Fields.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
